imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Transparent brand logo centered with even padding (ccpg-logo-transparent.dim_512x128.png)

existing_features.title: Add the user-uploaded brand logo (from "CCPG logo Transparent BG.png") as a static image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and use it as the primary hero logo in place of the current convert.cpg wordmark image.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace the conver.cpg image with the user's attached brand logo image

projectName: Replace convert.cpg wordmark image with uploaded brand logo
